description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability identified by CVE-2024-26161 related to the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server:

1. Download and apply the relevant security updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your operating system version. 
   - For Windows 11 (23H2): KB5035853. 
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5035845. 
   - For Windows Server 2016: KB5035855. 
   - Ensure that you are running a supported build number as listed below:
     - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3296
     - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4170

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the updates take effect.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is on a supported build and OS version as per the update listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.

**Update Packages**:
- You can find the updates at the following URLs:
   - [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845) 
   - [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853) 
   - [KB5035855](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035855)

This update addresses the vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the client through a malicious SQL Server connection.
